This is my second account, that I just made for CS:GO, because, guess what?! I got VAC banned! NO reason at all, I've got more than 2000 hours on this game and I was , and still am a totally legit player! So, after all these hours and all the struggle about getting ranks, playing competitive, getting banned for no reason and starting again from scratch, that's my honest opinion about the game! 

CS:GO is a great game, the gameplay is immersive, almost addictive and the multiplayer aspect makes it incredible to watch and play! The whole struggle to rank up, the economy, the tactics , the aim, everything that has to do with gameplay is awesome! The only thing that CS:GO is lacking, is a functioning anti-cheat system that PREVENTS hackers from hacking! The whole Overwatch system works, and it seems to work fine and it feels fair to be able to punish Hackers as a player! But why should you face them after all? What I mean by this is that NO overwatch, NO "A player you recently reported got banned" message is going to give me back the FUN and EXCITEMENT that "that" guy from "that" match took from me! And not only that, but it's possible to get banned for being absolutely legit and the most infuriating part of this is that NO ONE ,absolutely NO  O N E  is going to help you get your account back up and running!
Me cambio la vida este jueguito. El mejor FPS de la historia
